shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a user rejoins the channel.
Occurs when a user rejoins the channel.

section.p: When a user loses connection with the server because of network problems, the SDK automatically tries to reconnect and triggers this callback upon reconnection. When a user loses connection with the server because of network problems, the SDK automatically tries to reconnect and triggers this callback upon reconnection.

plentry.pd: The channel name. The channel name.
重新加入频道的用户 ID。 重新加入频道的用户 ID。
Time elapsed (ms) from starting to reconnect until the SDK triggers this callback. Time elapsed (ms) from starting to reconnect until the SDK triggers this callback.
